articles.title: Rekha Jhunjhunwala adds this smallcap stock to portfolio, increases stake in 5 others in Q2FY23 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Rekha has added small-cap stock Singer India to the portfolio during the second quarter of FY23. Apart from this, Rekha also increased its stake in five other stocks, three of which are backed by Tata Group.
articles.content: Although market mogul Rakesh Jhunjhunwala is not among us, however, his wife Rekha has made notable buying in a total of six stocks during the second quarter of FY23. She added a new small-cap stock … [+4742 chars]
